document.full_text: euro zone inflation slowed in may largely thanks to lower oil prices, but the dip is likely to be temporary and will not stop the european central bank from raising interest rates in july.
document.title: euro zone may inflation slows, ecb rate rise still seen
lines_and_colors: euro zone inflation slowed in may largely thanks to lower oil prices, but the dip is likely to be temporary and will not stop the european central bank from raising interest rates in july.
